entry.data:
SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 60
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT
